    • shortestPathLength

      public int shortestPathLength​(int startIndex, int targetIndex)
      Returns the weight of the least weight path in the network. Returns positive infinity if no path is found.

    • shortestPathLength

      public int shortestPathLength​(T startVertex, T targetVertex)
      Returns the weight of the least weight path in the network. Returns positive infinity if no path is found.
